metadata.title: Nejdet Tut - IT Teacher & EdTech Specialist
metadata.description: Private primary school IT teacher, Python and AI instructor. Online courses, student projects, and educational technologies.

hero.title: Raising Generations That Code the Future
hero.subtitle: Tailored IT and programming education for all ages – from private primary school to university level

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.p1: I currently serve as an IT teacher at a private primary school. At the same time, I work as a Python and Artificial Intelligence instructor at an IT training center. I am continuously improving myself with the goal of specializing in the EdTech field.
summary.p2: I use modern teaching methods and tools to develop my students' digital literacy skills and prepare them for the technologies of the future.

items.1: Python training for high school and university students
items.2: Fundamentals of artificial intelligence and machine learning
